Why is the <https://github.com/FluxML/Flux.jl/blob/master/src/data/dataloader.jl#L3|dataloader >using `Int` and `Bool` in struct definition:
```struct DataLoader{D}
    data::D
    batchsize::Int
    nobs::Int
    partial::Bool
    imax::Int
    indices::Vector{Int}
    shuffle::Bool
end```
I thought the recommendation was to do:
```struct DataLoader{D, T<:Int, B<:Bool}
    data::D
    batchsize::T
    nobs::T
    partial::B
    imax::T
    indices::Vector{T}
    shuffle::B
end```
here: <https://docs.julialang.org/en/v1/manual/performance-tips/#Type-declarations>
